column5: I know my current analog phone does not get a signal. However someone told me that Canada is almost exclusively Digital so I'd like to know if I upgrade to a digital phone (via Verizon), would I get a signal I could use from the middle of Big Sand lake? (or anywhere there abouts?) IaCraig
Yes, The last couple of years we've been able to use our phone on Gunn Lake. Not the best signal in the world, but usable.
Last year we found Verizon worked around Minaki. I don't know if it would work up on Big sand!
Craig.......I have an AT&T cell phone and have never gotten service up on Big Sand. I have gotten service up on the hill by the marina boat yard in Minaki but never on the lakes.
